org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.client.render.valuetype

Interface IValueTypeWorldRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockValueTypeWorldRenderer, FluidValueTypeWorldRenderer, IngredientsValueTypeWorldRenderer, ItemValueTypeWorldRenderer, ListValueTypeWorldRenderer, NbtValueTypeWorldRenderer, OperatorValueTypeWorldRenderer, RecipeValueTypeWorldRenderer, TextValueTypeWorldRenderer

    public interface IValueTypeWorldRenderer
    Renderer used to display values for a given value type in the world.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void renderValue(IPartContainer partContainer, double x, double y, double z, float partialTick, int destroyStage, net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing direction, IPartType partType, IValue value, net.minecraft.client.renderer.tileentity.TileEntityRendererDispatcher rendererDispatcher, float alpha)
      Render the overlay.

    • Method Detail

      • renderValue

        void renderValue(IPartContainer partContainer,
                 double x,
                 double y,
                 double z,
                 float partialTick,
                 int destroyStage,
                 net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing direction,
                 IPartType partType,
                 IValue value,
                 net.minecraft.client.renderer.tileentity.TileEntityRendererDispatcher rendererDispatcher,
                 float alpha)
        Render the overlay.
        Parameters:
        partContainer - The part container for this part.
        x - The center block X
        y - The center block Y
        z - The center block Z
        partialTick - The partial tick
        destroyStage - The destroy stage
        direction - The direction this part is facing.
        partType - The part type that is being overlayed
        value - The value to render
        rendererDispatcher - The render dispatcher
        alpha - The alpha to render with.
